metadata.title: CVE-2024-41061 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Fix array-index-out-of-bounds in dml2/FCLKChangeSupport[Why]Potential out of bounds access in dml2_calculate_rq_and_dlg_params()because the value of out_lowest_state_idx used as an index forFCLKChangeSupportarray can be greater than 1.[How]Currently dml2 core specifies identical values for all FCLKChangeSupportelements. Always use index 0 in the condition to avoid out of boundsaccess.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
